credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Restaurant Florent:  Boxer/comb/coffee
description: From left to right, extending about three quarters of the way across, are three photographic images: a pair of boxer shorts; a comb, vertically positioned; and a cup of coffee (showing wavy lines representing steam) on a saucer. To the right of the cup/saucer, is breakfast/ 2:30 AM  11 AM/ Florent, with the first and third lines in small, bold capitals. On one line below, about one inch from the bottom edge, in smaller bold capitals and positioned under the three images and column of type appearing above, is 24 hours/ Gansevoort/ Street 69/ 989-5779.
name: advertisement
